title:
Useful Tools & Resources
for Developers
excerpt:
Our goal is to provide online free tools so you don't have to install any
  software for basic usages. We are going to add new tools as often as possible!

applications.title: Base 64 (Encoder/Decoder)
applications.description: Encode to Base64 format or decode from base64 format

applications.title: XML to JSON Converter
applications.description: This tool helps you to convert XML data into JSON format.

applications.title: JSON to XML Converter
applications.description: This tool helps you to convert JSON data into XML format.

applications.title: Properties To YAML Converter
applications.description: This tool helps you to convert properties To YAML

applications.title: YAML to Properties Converter
applications.description: This tool helps you to convert YAML to properties

applications.title: YAML to JSON Converter
applications.description: This tool helps you to convert YAML files into Json object

applications.title: JSON to YAML Converter
applications.description: This tool helps you to convert YAML files into Json object

applications.title: URL (Encoder / Decoder)
applications.description: Encodes or decodes a string so that it conforms to the the URL Specification

applications.title: Epoch & Unix Timestamp Converter
applications.description: Converts an epoch/unix timestamp into a human readable date

applications.title: What's my IP?
applications.description: This webpage displays public IP address assigned by your ISP.

applications.title: Analyze HTTP Header
applications.description: This tool will analyse HTTP header of the specified url.

applications.title: Website Link Analyzer Tool
applications.description: Analyze both external and internal urls related to your site.

applications.title: SMTP test tools
applications.description: Test SMTP authentication and send email, troubleshoot Email issues in realtime.

applications.title: Password generator
applications.description: Test SMTP authentication and send email, troubleshoot Email issues in realtime.

applications.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
applications.description: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text with online tool for websites, templates.

categories.title: Other resources
categories.description: Our goal is to provide online free tools so you don't have to install any software for basic usages. We are going to add new tools as often as possible!
